context: C64 RAM Memory Map (Mapping The Commodore 64 by Sheldon Leemon)

splits.name: c64_memmap_6510_port_bank_switching
splits.description: 6510 CPU I/O port $0000-$0001 data direction register R6510 D6510 bank switching LORAM HIRAM CHAREN memory configuration ROM RAM mapping cassette motor control

splits.name: c64_memmap_zeropage_basic_pointers
splits.description: Zero page $0002-$002A BASIC internal pointers ADRAY1 ADRAY2 CHRGET CHARAC ENDCHR VERCK DIMFLG VALTYP CHANNL LINNUM TEMPPT TEMPST INDEX floating point work area

splits.name: c64_memmap_zeropage_basic_runtime
splits.description: Zero page $002B-$0072 BASIC runtime pointers TXTTAB VARTAB ARYTAB STREND FRETOP MEMSIZ CURLIN OLDLIN DATPTR VARNAM VARPNT FORPNT FAC ARG floating point accumulators FP math

splits.name: c64_memmap_chrget_rnd_seed
splits.description: Zero page $0073-$008F CHRGET subroutine BASIC text character fetch self-modifying code TXTPTR text pointer RNDX RND seed value random number generator

splits.name: c64_memmap_zeropage_kernal_io
splits.description: Zero page $0090-$00C4 KERNAL I/O STATUS ST word STKEY stop key VERCK load verify C3P0 BSOUR serial bus LDTND DFLTN DFLTO default devices FNLEN LA SA FA filename logical file device number secondary address RS-232 cassette tape

splits.name: c64_memmap_zeropage_screen_editor
splits.description: Zero page $00C5-$00FE screen editor variables LSTX NDX keyboard buffer RVS reverse BLNSW BLNCT cursor blink PNT screen line pointer PNTR cursor column QTSW quote mode TBLX cursor line LDTB1 screen line link table USER color RAM pointer KEYTAB keyboard decode RIBUF ROBUF RS-232 buffers FREKZP free zero page

splits.name: c64_memmap_stack_input_buffer
splits.description: Memory $00FF-$0258 processor stack area $0100-$01FF BAD tape error log BASIC line editor input buffer BUF $0200-$0258 stack operations subroutine nesting

splits.name: c64_memmap_kernal_tables_keyboard
splits.description: Memory $0259-$0292 KERNAL file tables LAT FAT SAT logical file device secondary address KEYD keyboard buffer $0277 MEMSTR MEMSIZ OS memory pointers COLOR foreground color HIBASE screen page XMAX keyboard buffer size RPTFLAG key repeat SHFLAG shift CTRL logo KEYLOG keyboard vector MODE charset switching AUTODN scroll

splits.name: c64_memmap_rs232_registers
splits.description: Memory $0293-$02FF RS-232 pseudo 6551 registers M51CTR M51CDR control command RSSTAT status BITNUM BAUDOF baud rate RIDBE RIDBS RODBS RODBE buffer indices IRQTMP IRQ save ENABL RS-232 interrupts PAL NTSC flag $02A6

splits.name: c64_memmap_vectors_and_registers
splits.description: Memory $0300-$03FB BASIC indirect vector table IERROR IMAIN ICRNCH IQPLOP IGONE IEVAL register storage SAREG SXREG SYREG SPREG USR function CINV IRQ vector $0314 CBINV BRK vector NMINV NMI vector KERNAL indirect vectors IOPEN ICLOSE ICHKIN ICKOUT ICLRCH IBASIN IBSOUT ISTOP IGETIN ICLALL ILOAD ISAVE cassette buffer TBUFFR $033C

splits.name: c64_memmap_cassette_buffer
